messages.message: Hello, thank you for calling Glia Financial. My name is Emily, and I'll be assisting you today. How can I help you?
Hi, Emily. My name is ${firstName}. I wanted to ask about some of the new services you offer.
Hi, ${firstName}. I'd be happy to help. We recently started offering various types of insurance, including auto, home, and life insurance. Is there a particular type you're interested in?
I'm interested in auto insurance. Can you tell me more about that?

Of course! Our auto insurance provides comprehensive coverage options, including liability, collision, and comprehensive coverage. We also offer various discounts for safe driving, multiple policies, and more.
That sounds good. How do I get started with purchasing auto insurance through Glia Financial?

To get started, we can provide you with a quote. I'll need some information about your vehicle and driving history. Can you provide the make, model, and year of your vehicle, as well as your driving record?
Sure. My car is a 2018 Honda Accord, and I have a clean driving record with no accidents or violations.
Thank you, ${firstName}. I'll input this information and generate a quote for you. This will just take a moment.
Alright, thanks.
I've generated your quote. For comprehensive coverage, including liability, collision, and comprehensive insurance, your premium would be $75 per month. Does that sound good to you?
Yes, that sounds reasonable. How do I proceed with purchasing the policy?
Great! I can help you complete the purchase over the phone. I'll need to confirm a few details and get your payment information. Are you ready to proceed?
Yes, I'm ready.
Perfect. I'll just need to confirm your full name, address, and preferred payment method.
My full name is ${firstName} ${lastName}, my address is 123 Oak Street, Springfield, and I'll use my credit card for the payment.
Thank you, ${firstName}. Your auto insurance policy is now active. You'll receive your policy documents via email shortly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thanks for your help, Emily.
You're welcome, ${firstName}. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to call us back. Have a great day!
You too. Goodbye.
Goodbye.
Say my aunt needs to send me plane fare later on this month for travel. What's your routing number?
The routing number at Cortex Financial is 820934801 . To set up a direct deposit, press or say 1. To set up a wire transfer, press or say 2. To learn more about direct deposit, press or say 3.
I'm sorry. The baby was crying in the background. He repeat that.
Happy to repeat it for you. You can also say "text me" to get this information via SMS. Message and data rates may apply.
The routing number at Cortex Financial is 820934801 . To set up a direct deposit, press or say 1. To set up a wire transfer, press or say 2. To learn more about direct deposit, press or say 3.
okay, can you text me that
We have sent the answer to your phone. If you do not receive the text, text "start" to this number, and try again.
so if I can't send me that money, how long it's going to take to show up in my account,
It can take up to 5 days for funds to be available after a wire transfer has been sent. This can very depending on who sent the transfer and from where.
Okay. And then what's that received that money? Do I need to let you know that I'm traveling?
To make sure I get it right, did you mean any of the following? Travel notification, press or say 1. Status of request, press or say 2. For something else, press or say 3.

No need to notify us about your upcoming trip. Your credit card and account are automatically protected and we'll watch for any suspicious activity. If you travel often, why not consider upgrading to our Travel Rewards Card. You'll receive reward points for flights and hotels. To learn more, press or say 1.
Maybe later.
Actually, could I try speaking with someone else regarding my home loan?
Hi, is my home loan still active?
No.
Bye! Feel free to call back anytime.
